Robin Rendle

July 9, 2020 • San Francisco, California

Nichrome

Via Robin’s newsletter I just spotted this release on Future Fonts of Nichrome by Mass-Driver, “a display face referencing the typography of paperback science fiction from the 70s and early 80s.” And these numbers in particular are rather striking—make sure to look very closely at that 3:

I’m an enormous fan of Mass-Driver and Rutherford Craze’s work, going so far as to use his MDSystem type family not so long ago for Dartmoor, Death Stranding, and me.
